PAD_BrokeOath.synopsis: Paladin players breaks their oath and reacts to it.
PAD_BrokeOath.how_to_trigger: 1. Have a paladin in your party and select it.2. oe MakeOathbreaker

PAD_BrokeOath_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BrokeOath_0.text: What's this? Feels like I've lost something...

PAD_BrokeOath_1.speaker: Player
PAD_BrokeOath_1.text: I know that feeling. My oath is forsaken once more.
PAD_BrokeOath_1.context: NodeContext: Karlach: A little sad/ frustrated
